Name: vads-font-line-height-heading
description: Default line height for headings. Was 1.3

Name: vads-font-size-body-lead
description: Lead font size for body text. For lead paragraphs.

Name: vads-font-size-eyebrow
description: Eyebrow is an experimental request which adds type above an h1.

Name: vads-font-size-heading-level-6
description: Heading level 6. h6 value. h6 is also sans-serif, unlike other headers.
